resources.string:
Fizz-Buzz consists in:

- writing all numbers from 1 to #Limit.
- Replacing all multiples of #fizzMultible by #fizzLabel
- Replacing all multiples of #buzzMultiple by #buzzLabel.
- And replacing all multiples of #fizzMultiple times #buzzMultiple by "#fizzLabel" + "#buzzLabel".

The output with 3, fizz, 5, buzz, 100 would look like this:
"1, 2, fizz, 4, buzz, fizz, 7, 8, fizz, buzz, 11, fizz, 13, 14, fizzbuzz, 16 , â€¦, 99, buzz".
This field should be a number.
This field should be a positive integer.
